Item: MVP-07: Dispatcher cockpit and technician packet implementation
Description: Implement interactive dispatcher and technician workflows strictly backed by dispatch-api command endpoints.
AcceptanceCriteria: UI actions map only to closed dispatch commands and show fail-closed policy errors with role restrictions.

Item: MVP-08: Pilot UAT and cutover readiness
Description: Execute ops SME UAT rollback rehearsal and release-candidate freeze for pilot cutover.
AcceptanceCriteria: UAT signoff and production cutover checklist completed with rollback plan validated.
